casebody.data:
State
v.
Samson Jamarco Coleman 404P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney Geneal, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Samson Jamarco Coleman, for Coleman, Samson Jamarco

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of October 2016 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
